div.p: Yearly mean gridded data from the KCM and the Mk3L simulations are available through https://data.geomar.de/thredds/catalog/open_access/bordbar_et_al_2019_nc/catalog.html and citable using the following 10.1038/NCLIMATE2569, 10.1002/2016GL072355, 10.1175/JCLI-D-11-00287.1, 10.1175/JCLI-D-12-00108.1. Simulated data from the CESM1-CAM5 experiments can be downloaded from http://www.cesm.ucar.edu/experiments/cesm1.1/LE/.
